body_html:
With v5 of cuDNN with a Titan X Pascal (compiled targeting compute version 5.2) I got the following on the MNIST model:

Run #1
Step 8500 (epoch 9.89), 4.1 ms
Minibatch loss: 1.604, learning rate: 0.006302
Minibatch error: 0.0%
Validation error: 0.9%
Test error: 0.8%

Run #2
Step 8500 (epoch 9.89), 4.2 ms
Minibatch loss: 1.595, learning rate: 0.006302
Minibatch error: 0.0%
Validation error: 0.8%
Test error: 0.8%

body:
With v5 of cuDNN with a Titan X Pascal (compiled targeting compute version 5.2) I got the following on the MNIST model:

```
Run #1
Step 8500 (epoch 9.89), 4.1 ms
Minibatch loss: 1.604, learning rate: 0.006302
Minibatch error: 0.0%
Validation error: 0.9%
Test error: 0.8%

Run #2
Step 8500 (epoch 9.89), 4.2 ms
Minibatch loss: 1.595, learning rate: 0.006302
Minibatch error: 0.0%
Validation error: 0.8%
Test error: 0.8%
```
